name: Name
remarks: The user-friendly name of this instance.

name: Alias
remarks: The user-friendly alias of this instance. May be the same as Name. Used in place of Name in combat text and the like.

name: HasTag
remarks: Returns whether this object has the specified tag. Tags are arbitrary text labels like "dog" or "friend" or "fishing". They are not used by the game engine, so you are free to use them for any purpose.

input.name: tag
input.desc: script tag to find, not case-sensitive

output.desc: true if matching tag was found, false otherwise

name: AddTag
remarks: Adds the specified tag to this object's tag list.

input.name: tag
input.desc: script tag to add, not case-sensitive

name: RemoveTag
remarks: Removes the specified tag from this object. No error is thrown if the tag was not found.

input.name: tag
input.desc: script tag to remove, not case-sensitive
